quote: A good memory and a tongue tied in the middle is a combination which gives immortality to conversation.
A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
A man may forgive many wrongs, but he cannot easily forgive anyone who makes it plain that his conversation is tedious.
A single conversation across the table with a wise man is better than ten years mere study of books.
Argument, as usually managed, is the worst sort of conversation, as in books it is generally the worst sort of reading.
As a work of art it has the same status as a long conversation between two not very bright drunks.

Conceit causes more conversation than wit.
Conversation between Adam and Eve must have been difficult at times because they had nobody to talk about.
Conversation is an art in which a man has all mankind for competitors.
Conversation is three women stand on the corner talking. Gossip is when one of them leaves.
Conversation should touch everything, but should concentrate itself on nothing.
Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.

Criticism should be a casual conversation.
Debate is masculine, conversation is feminine.
Don't knock the weather; nine-tenths of the people couldn't start a conversation if it didn't change once in a while.

Good conversation unrolls itself like the spring or like the dawn.
He had occasional flashes of silence that made his conversation perfectly delightful.
I learned that a long walk and calm conversation are an incredible combination if you want to build a bridge.
I often quote myself. It adds spice to my conversation.
I would rather take hellebore than spend a conversation with a good, little man.
If one hears bad music, it is one's duty to drown it by one's conversation.
If other people are going to talk, conversation becomes impossible.
If you ever have to support a flagging conversation, introduce the topic of eating.
If you're yelling you're the one who's lost control of the conversation.
In America journalism is apt to be regarded as an extension of history: in Britain, as an extension of conversation.

It requires nothing less than a chivalric feeling to sustain a conversation with a lady.
Listening well and answering well is one of the greatest perfections that can be obtained in conversation.

Modest egotism is the salt of conversation.

Only if we can restrain ourselves is conversation possible.
Only if we can restrain ourselves is conversation possible. Good talk rises upon much discipline.

Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
